Utility class for generic Http help functions. More...

Detailed Description

Utility class for generic Http help functions.

uint32 HttpUtility::addMapSymbols (  char *  target,
const GfxFeatureMap *  symbolMap,
uint32  maxURLSize = 512
)  [static]
 

Add map symbols to an URL.

Parameters:
target The string to add map symbols URL data to.
symbolMap The map with the symbols to add.
maxURLSize The maximun nbr of chars to write to the target.
Returns:
The number of chars written to target.

bool HttpUtility::checkAuth (  const char *  auth  )  [static]
 

Check if the authentication is in the authentication list.

Parameters:
auth The string with the authentication.
Returns:
True if the authentication if succesfull, false if not or error.

void HttpUtility::checkMinimumBoundingbox (  int32 &  minLat,
int32 &  maxLat,
int32 &  minLon,
int32 &  maxLon,
float64  frame = 0.0,
int32  minWidth = 40000,
int32  minHeight = 40000
)  [static]
 

Makes sure that the boundingbox isn't too small.

Parameters:
minLat minimum latitude.
minLon minimum longitude.
maxLat maximum latitude.
maxLon maximum longitude.
frame How much frame to add around bbox. Default 0.0.
minWidth Minimum width in mc2-coordinates of the boundingbox. Default value 40000.
minHeight Minimum height in mc2-coordinates of the boundingbox, not taking coslat into consideration. Default value 40000.

void HttpUtility::clear (   )  [static]
 

Remove all current data.

Mostly used when shuting down. Monitor procedure.

ImageDrawConfig::imageFormat HttpUtility::getImageFormatForRequest (  const HttpHeader *  inHead,
ImageDrawConfig::imageFormat  defaultFormat = ImageDrawConfig::PNG
)  [static]
 

Checks the headers of a request and makes the best choice of image format for the requester.

Parameters:
inHead The http header with the possible Accept-line.
defaultFormat The format to return if no format was found in inHead, default PNG.

void HttpUtility::getNavCrossingMC2BoundingBox (  ExpandRouteReplyPacket *  expand,
ExpandItemID *  exp,
ExpandStringItem **  stringItems,
uint32  index,
int32 &  minLat,
int32 &  maxLat,
int32 &  minLon,
int32 &  maxLon,
uint16 &  angle
)  [static]
 

Calculates the boundingbox for a certain turn of a route.

The boundingbox is intended to be used for extracting crossingmaps used in a navigation application.

Parameters:
expand The ExpandRouteReplyPacket with the route.
exp The ExpandItemID with the RouteItems stored.
stringItems The string items of the route.
index The index of the turn in the route.
minLat Set to minimum latitude of requested bb.
minLon Set to minimum longitude of requested bb.
maxLat Set to maximum latitude of requested bb.
maxLon Set to maximum longitude of requested bb.
angle Set to the angle of the map.

void HttpUtility::getRouteMC2BoundingBox (  ExpandRouteReplyPacket *  expand,
ExpandItemID *  exp,
uint32  startIndex,
uint32  stopIndex,
int32 &  minLat,
int32 &  maxLat,
int32 &  minLon,
int32 &  maxLon
)  [static]
 

Calculates the boudingbox for a route.

Parameters:
expand The ExpandRouteReplyPacket with the route.
exp The ExpandItemID with the RouteItems stored.
startIndex The index to start counting boundingbox in the route.
stopIndex The index to stop counting boundingbox in the route.
minLat Set to minimum latitude of requested bb.
minLon Set to minimum longitude of requested bb.
maxLat Set to maximum latitude of requested bb.
maxLon Set to maximum longitude of requested bb.

void HttpUtility::initializeCheckAuth (   )  [static, private]
 

Initializes the checkAuth authentication.

Monitor procedure.

SMSSendRequest* HttpUtility::makeLinkSMS (  const char *  comment,
const char *  link,
const CellularPhoneModel *  cellular,
uint16  reqID,
const char *  service,
const char *  receiver
)  [static]
 

Makes an SMS with as much as possible of comment before link.

Parameters:
comment The comment text to add before link in SMS, is trunkated to fit into SMS.
link The link to have last in SMS after comment.
cellular The cellular model.
reqID The requestID to use.
service The SMS service to use.
receiver The receiver of the SMS.
Returns:
A new SMSSendRequest with the SMS.

char* HttpUtility::makeLocalMapLink (  char *  target,
const char *  host,
const char *  protocol,
int32  ula,
int32  llo,
int32  lla,
int32  ulo,
GfxFeatureMap *  symbolMap,
StringTable::languageCode  lang,
const char *  localMapString = NULL,
const char *  signature = NULL,
const char *  localMapPage = "lmap.wml",
const char *  clientType = NULL
)  [static]
 

Makes a link to a certain area with optional markers for later use.

Parameters:
target The string to print the link into.
host The host to make the link to.
protocol The protocol to use in link. "http".
ula The northern latitude.
llo The western longitude.
lla The southern latitude.
ulo The eastern longitude.
symbolMap A GfxFeatureMap with GfxFeatureSymbols that should be shown on the map image. May be NULL.
lang The language that the text should have.
localMapString A string describing the localmap. Default NULL.
signature THe signature. Default NULL.
localMapPage The page that serves local maps, default "lmap.wml".
clientType The client type to use, or NULL. return The target or NULL if something is wrong.

SMSSendRequest* HttpUtility::makeLocalMapLinkSMS (  const char *  comment,
const char *  host,
const char *  protocol,
int32  ula,
int32  llo,
int32  lla,
int32  ulo,
GfxFeatureMap *  symbolMap,
StringTable::languageCode  lang,
CellularPhoneModel *  cellular,
uint16  reqID,
const char *  service,
const char *  receiver,
const char *  routePage = "lmap.wml"
)  [static]
 

Makes a SMSSendRequest with the comment text before the localMapLink text.

The comment is trunkated if it where to increase the size of the SMS beyond the MAX_SMS_SIZE.

Parameters:
comment The comment text to add before link in SMS, is trunkated to fit into SMS.
host The host to make the link to.
protocol The protocol to use in link. "http".
ula The northern latitude.
llo The western longitude.
lla The southern latitude.
ulo The eastern longitude.
symbolMap A GfxFeatureMap with GfxFeatureSymbols that should be shown on the map image. May be NULL.
lang The language that the text should have.
lang The language that the route should be presented in.
cellular The cellular model.
reqID The requestID to use.
service The SMS service to use, "WEBB".
receiver The receiver of the SMS.
routePage The page that serves stored routes, default "lmap.wml". return A new SMSSendRequest with the SMS or NULL if something is wrong.

void HttpUtility::makeMapURL (  char *  target,
char *  widthStr,
char *  heightStr,
const HttpHeader *  inHead,
uint32  routeID,
uint32  routeCreateTime,
uint32  beforeTurn,
uint32  afterTurn,
uint32  turn,
uint16  width,
uint16  height,
int32  minLat,
int32  minLon,
int32  maxLat,
int32  maxLon,
ImageDrawConfig::imageFormat  defaultFormat = ImageDrawConfig::PNG,
MapSettingsTypes::defaultMapSetting  mapSetting = MapSettingsTypes::MAP_SETTING_STD,
bool  showMap = true,
bool  showTopographMap = true,
bool  showPOI = true,
bool  showRoute = true,
bool  showScale = false,
bool  showTraffic = false,
struct MapSettingsTypes::ImageSettings *  imageSettings = NULL,
const GfxFeatureMap *  symbolMap = NULL,
const char *  clientType = NULL
)  [static]
 

Makes an URL to an imagemap.

The boundingbox is adjusted to fill the map.

Parameters:
target The string to print the URL into. Must be 4096 bytes or more.
widthStr The string to print the width into, may be NULL.
heightStr The string to print the height into, may be NULL.
beforeTurn The index of the feature to start the routeturn at.
afterTurn The index of the feature to stop the routeturn at.
turn The index of the turn, used as an alternative to beforeTurn and afterTurn.
inHead The HttpHeader of the HTTPrequest with the accept headers. See also defaultFormat.
routeID The routeID of the route.
routeCreateTime The routes create time.
width The width of the output.
height The height of the output.
minLat Minimum latitude of requested map.
minLon Minimum longitude of requested map.
maxLat Maximum latitude of requested map.
maxLon Maximum longitude of requested map.
defaultFormat The default format of the link. Default PNG.
mapSetting The defaultMapSetting to use. Default STD.
showMap If map contents should be on map.
showTopographMap If topographical map contents should be on map.
showPOI If POI contents should be on map.
showRoute If route contents should be in map, requires valid routeID.
showScale If scale should be on map.
showTraffic If trafficinformation should be in map.
imageSettings The ImageSettings to use, default NULL.
symbolMap The map symbols to put on map, default NULL.
clientType The client type to use, or NULL.

char* HttpUtility::makeRouteLink (  char *  target,
const char *  host,
const char *  protocol,
uint32  routeID,
uint32  routeCreateTime,
StringTable::languageCode  lang,
const char *  originString,
const char *  originLocationString,
const char *  destinationString,
const char *  destinationLocationString,
const char *  signature,
const char *  routePage = "route.html"
)  [static]
 

Makes a html link to a stored route.

Parameters:
target The string to print the link into.
host The host to make the link to.
protocol The protocol to use in link. "http".
routeID The id of the route. 65.
routeCreateTime The creation time of the route. 1002099708.
lang The language that the route should be presented in.
originString String describing the origin.
originLocationString String describing the origin's location.
destinationString String describing the destination.
destinationLocationString String describing the destination's location.
signature The signuture, text last, on the page.
routePage The page that serves stored routes, default "route.html". return The target or NULL if something is wrong.

SMSSendRequest* HttpUtility::makeRouteLinkSMS (  const char *  comment,
const char *  host,
const char *  protocol,
uint32  routeID,
uint32  routeCreateTime,
StringTable::languageCode  lang,
const CellularPhoneModel *  cellular,
uint16  reqID,
const char *  service,
const char *  receiver,
const char *  routePage = "route.wml"
)  [static]
 

Makes a SMSSendRequest with the comment text before the routeLink text.

The comment is trunkated if it where to increase the size of the SMS beyond the MAX_SMS_SIZE.

Parameters:
comment The comment text to add before link in SMS, is trunkated to fit into SMS.
host The host to make the link to.
protocol The protocol to use in link. "http".
routeID The id of the route. 65.
routeCreateTime The creation time of the route. 1002099708.
lang The language that the route should be presented in.
cellular The cellular model.
reqID The requestID to use.
service The SMS service to use, "WEBB".
receiver The receiver of the SMS.
routePage The page that serves stored routes, default "route.wml". return A new SMSSendRequest with the SMS or NULL if something is wrong.

bool HttpUtility::parseUserSettings (  const char *  str,
StringTable::languageCode &  userLang
)  [static]
 

Parses str for user settings.

Parameters:
str The string to parse for user settings.
userLang Set to the language in user setting.
Returns:
True if str contains valid user settings, false if not.

void HttpUtility::readMapSymbols (  const MC2String *  str,
GfxFeatureMap *  symbolMap
)  [static]
 

Reads map symbols from an HttpHeader parameterlist.

Parameters:
str The parameterlist.
symbolMap The GfxFeatureMap to add the GfxSymbolFeatures to.

void HttpUtility::turnItemIndexFromStringItemIndex (  ExpandItemID *  exp,
uint32  startIndex,
uint32  stopIndex,
uint32 &  beforeTurn,
uint32 &  afterTurn
)  [static]
 

Calculates the beforeturnitemindex and the afterturnitemindex for a pair of stringitemindexes.

Parameters:
exp The ExpandItemID with the groups.
startIndex The starting stringitemindex.
stopIndex The ending stringitemindex.
beforeTurn Set to the first coordinate item index.
afterTurn Set to the last coordinate item index.
